name: Oval
description: Oval takes your skills to a whole new level with thrilling and competitive multiplayer battles. Break your speed limit and go faster than ever without motion-sickness thanks to Oval's unique technology. Create, share or play awesome community maps using the multiplayer level editor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 64 bits or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or equivalent Network: Broadband Internet connection Additional Notes: VR Only
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 64 bits or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or equivalent Network: Broadband Internet connection Additional Notes: VR Only
